publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7136 Aileen Campbell: Congratulations to Beautiful Forth and Lanarkâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Forth on collecting a silver medal and Lanark a bronze at the 2010 Beautiful Scotland Awards; commends the effort and commitment of the volunteers to improve the local environment of their areas; recognises that this is the second year in a row that both Forth and Lanark have received Beautiful Scotland awards, and looks forward to the future projects of both groups and their continued success. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-7136 Congratulations to Beautiful Forth and Lanark (lodged on 4 October 2010) Jim Hume*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7136 Congratulations to Beautiful Forth and Lanark (lodged on 4 October 2010) Angela Constance*
